chunks.chunk_text: 哈囉哈囉!各位通勤家族朋友們!我是 John 老師!你想利用通勤時間或生活空檔提升英語能力嗎?如果答案是 YES,那麼現在正是改變的時刻!Fifteen Minutes Start Today 通勤學英語!自去年底推出了訂閱制,到現在已經幫助了四百多位訂閱戶,讓他們的聽力與詞彙量每天都更加進步!這是因為我們訂閱制打造了獨一無二的曾經式英語學習體驗,無論是想突破聽力瓶頸

chunks.chunk_text: 或者是渴望詞彙量的提升,都有相對應的 VIP 會員方案!你想要事半功倍的提升你英語水平嗎?如果答案是 YES,那麼別憂鬱!立刻加入通勤學英語 VIP 會員,與我們一同在英語的路上前進吧!

chunks.chunk_text: MrBeast, the YouTube sensation known for his extravagant videos and philanthropic efforts has recently found himself at the center of controversy. The content creator whose real name is Jimmy Donaldson has acknowledged using inappropriate language in his early online days. This admission comes as clips from 2017 podcasts containing racist and sexist comments have resurfaced on social media.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_國際時事跟讀 Ep.K831_ YouTube 最大明星 MrBeast 因過往言論陷入爭議 MrBeast_ YouTubes Biggest Star F.json

chunks.chunk_text: MrBeast has become a household name among young audiences. His videos featuring whimsical challenges and generous giveaways regularly attract over 100 million views. However, the emergence of these controversial clips has cast a shadow over his reputation. In one instance, Donaldson was heard responding to a viewer's comment about selling black people for money,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_國際時事跟讀 Ep.K831_ YouTube 最大明星 MrBeast 因過往言論陷入爭議 MrBeast_ YouTubes Biggest Star F.json

chunks.chunk_text: saying that the most I would pay is probably 300. He also used homophobic slurs and made inappropriate comments about underage celebrities. A spokesperson for MrBeast addressed the situation, explaining that when Donaldson was a teenager, he acted like many kids and used inappropriate language while trying to be funny. The statement emphasized that over the years, Donaldson has repeatedly apologized and learned
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_國際時事跟讀 Ep.K831_ YouTube 最大明星 MrBeast 因過往言論陷入爭議 MrBeast_ YouTubes Biggest Star F.json

chunks.chunk_text: the responsibility that comes with his increasing influence. As an adult, he has reportedly focused on engaging with his community to make a positive impact around the world. This response highlights the complex issue of holding public figures accountable for past behavior while acknowledging personal growth and change. The controversy surrounding MrBeast doesn't end with his past remarks. His longtime collaborator,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_國際時事跟讀 Ep.K831_ YouTube 最大明星 MrBeast 因過往言論陷入爭議 MrBeast_ YouTubes Biggest Star F.json

chunks.chunk_text: Chris Tyson, has been accused of sending inappropriate messages to a minor. Donaldson has distanced himself from Tyson, stating that he is disgusted and opposed to such unacceptable acts. He has taken immediate action to remove Tyson from his company and channel.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_國際時事跟讀 Ep.K831_ YouTube 最大明星 MrBeast 因過往言論陷入爭議 MrBeast_ YouTubes Biggest Star F.json

chunks.chunk_text: Donaldson's influence extends far beyond YouTube. His ability to weather the storm may depend on how he continues to address these issues and demonstrate genuine change.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_國際時事跟讀 Ep.K831_ YouTube 最大明星 MrBeast 因過往言論陷入爭議 MrBeast_ YouTubes Biggest Star F.json

chunks.chunk_text: Let's move on to keyword drills. Our first keyword, philanthropic. Philanthropic means giving money to help people who are poor or sick or to actively helping people.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_國際時事跟讀 Ep.K831_ YouTube 最大明星 MrBeast 因過往言論陷入爭議 MrBeast_ YouTubes Biggest Star F.json

chunks.chunk_text: Here surfaced means to show up again and resurfaced means showed up on internet again.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_國際時事跟讀 Ep.K831_ YouTube 最大明星 MrBeast 因過往言論陷入爭議 MrBeast_ YouTubes Biggest Star F.json

chunks.chunk_text: Next keyword, whimsical. Whimsical means the personal idea that is unusual, playful and not serious. Example sentence.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_國際時事跟讀 Ep.K831_ YouTube 最大明星 MrBeast 因過往言論陷入爭議 MrBeast_ YouTubes Biggest Star F.json

chunks.chunk_text: Inappropriate means not appropriate, which means not right for the occasion. Example sentence. He also used homophobic slurs and made inappropriate comments about underage celebrities. Last keyword of the day, repeatedly.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_國際時事跟讀 Ep.K831_ YouTube 最大明星 MrBeast 因過往言論陷入爭議 MrBeast_ YouTubes Biggest Star F.json

chunks.chunk_text: Repeatedly means to do something over and over again. Example sentence.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_國際時事跟讀 Ep.K831_ YouTube 最大明星 MrBeast 因過往言論陷入爭議 MrBeast_ YouTubes Biggest Star F.json

chunks.chunk_text: Reading out loud in full English and practicing in full English is a little stressful for you. Don't worry. Take it one step at a time. You have to separate your reading out loud activity to your casual listening, to your deliberate practices. So today just take 15 minutes and do what you can and take on a different practice tomorrow. By the end of the week, if you have another 15 minutes to spare, come back again and shadow along. The point is not to overstress yourself and enjoy this process.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_國際時事跟讀 Ep.K831_ YouTube 最大明星 MrBeast 因過往言論陷入爭議 MrBeast_ YouTubes Biggest Star F.json

chunks.chunk_text: Giving yourself this full English environment and making a habit of listening in full English helps you in the long term. As you enjoy this more and more, you won't feel like you are really practicing.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_國際時事跟讀 Ep.K831_ YouTube 最大明星 MrBeast 因過往言論陷入爭議 MrBeast_ YouTubes Biggest Star F.json

chunks.chunk_text: Good job and thanks for tuning in.想要收聽更多過去的跟讀單元以及節目,歡迎到我們官網www.15mins.today.有興趣John老師以及其他資深英語老師對談的節目,記得週末也要回來收聽我們《同情宣傳》。
